youtube.title: The Life Cycle of Malaria: Sporozoites to Gametocytes Explained
youtube.description: Learn the complete life cycle of the Malaria parasite, Plasmodium. From the initial mosquito bite and sporozoites entering the liver to merozoites infecting red blood cells and the formation of gametocytes. Visualized biology for easy understanding! #Malaria #Biology #Science
